metadata.title: CVE-2021-44961 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A memory leakage flaw exists in the class PerimeterGenerator of Slic3rlibslic3r 1.3.0 and Master Commit b1a5500. Specially crafted stl files canexhaust available memory. An attacker can provide malicious files totrigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
